entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Three Hills
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:34 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -27.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Three Hills 03:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -27.0°C
Humidity: 71 %

Dewpoint: -30.7°C
Wind: NNE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 30%
